channel.title: Clan Chat & PM
channel.description:
In a clan chat when a admin talks it's a mod crown, then when he PM's it's also a crown.
When a moderator talks it's a donator sign, not a mod crown, and when the moderator PM's it's also a donator sign how would I fix this?

item.title: Clan Chat & PM
item.dc:creator: @Drzw Drzw
item.description:
@Drzw wrote:

This will be client sided,

case 1: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[1].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 2: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 3: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; case 4: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[0].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break; default: j2 += clanNameWidth; break;

So let’s say you have “Case 4:” that would be rank 4 which is your donator rank, then you add the donator crown sprite which is <img=0>

Then there you go.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Chat & PM
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Barrickz, post:1, topic:536352”]In a clan chat when a admin talks it’s a mod crown, then when he PM’s it’s also a crown.

When a moderator talks it’s a donator sign, not a mod crown, and when the moderator PM’s it’s also a donator sign how would I fix this?[/quote]

The server has assigned the crown sprite for the moderator to be a donator sign. Change it back to a silver crown, there is an ID.

Read full topic
